ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Rating__c, 'Poor'),SP_Evaluated__c = True)|| AND( ISPICKVAL( Rating__c, 'Average'),SP_Evaluated__c = True)|| AND( ISPICKVAL( Rating__c, 'Good'),SP_Evaluated__c = True)|| AND( ISPICKVAL( Rating__c, 'Very Good'),SP_Evaluated__c = True)|| AND( ISPICKVAL( Rating__c, 'Excellent'),SP_Evaluated__c = True)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Este Shipment ya ha sido Evaluado
